docs.snippet: Media executives watch skeptically as Mark Zuckerberg, in a heated political environment, shifts the focus of his site back to the personal.

headline.main: The End of the Social News Era? Journalists Brace for Facebook’s Big Change

docs.snippet: Stocks have risen for so long and with such steadiness that Wall Street is becoming nervous. What’s an investor to do? For insight, check out our quarterly report on investing.

docs.snippet: Apple should give parents more tools to curb technology use by children and study the health effects of excessive screen time, two big funds said.

headline.main: Tech Backlash Grows as Investors Press Apple to Act on Children’s Use

docs.snippet: Budgets for video-streaming content are rising faster than revenue. Something will have to give in 2018.
